definition: lit. punish one, warn one hundred (idiom)/fig. to make an example of sb
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit

sentences.english: Those responsible for the disturbance in the prison were made an example of/made examples of by the governor.
sentences.chinese: 爲懲一儆百，監獄長懲罰了在監獄製造騷亂的人。
